name: Robonyte: The Bread Guardian
description:
In this game, you just gotta protect the Bread man! But how long can you protect the Bread for?

I'm sure you can't beat my highscore of 145

CONTROLS:

WASD  to move

P  to attack (You can also jump on the enemy to kill it)

Esc  to pause 

Enter to start/pause game

HOW THE DINOS SPEED WORK:

After 30 points, the speed increases.

At 100 points, it increases again

Then the last speed increase is at 200.

CREDITS:

made by Abio
